毼字的基本解释

毼
hé
毯一类的毛织品：“庚午减陕西织造绒毼之半。”
古同“鶡”。

毼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hé］
［《廣韻》胡葛切，入曷，匣。］
亦作“1”。
(1)一种毛织的布。
(2)通“鶡”。参见“毼雞”。
[②]［dā］
［《字彙》得合切］
见“氀2毼”。
[③]［kě］
［《集韻》丘葛切，入曷，溪。］
同“楬2”。
不加彩饰。

毼字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【毛字部】　毼； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页595第04
【廣韻】胡割切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】何葛切，?音曷。【博雅】?毼，罽也。【後漢·烏桓傳】婦人能刺韋，作文繡，織氀毼。【註】廣雅曰：氀毼，罽也，氀，力于反。毼，胡葛反。【陳琳·神武賦】黼錦繢組，罽毼皮服。　又毛布也。或从衣作褐。　又與鶡同。雞名。【後漢·西南夷傳】冉駹夷有五角羊、麝香、輕毛毼雞、牲牲。【註】郭璞註：《山海經》曰：毼雞似雉而大，靑色，有毛角，鬭敵死乃止。今通作鶡。　又【集韻】丘葛切，音渴。與楬同。豆不飾曰楬。或从毛作毼。【儀禮·士喪禮】毼豆兩。【註】毼，白也。　又【字彙】得合切，音答。【李翊·俗呼小錄】今俗謂性劣者爲氀毼。氀音兜，毼音達。

毼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
毼字的起名意思

暂无。

Luo
Basic explanation of words
Luo
hé
Woolen fabrics such as blankets: "Gengwu minus half of the velvet weaving in Shaanxi."
The ancient same "he".
Luo
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hé］
["Guangyun" Hu Ge cut, enters, box. ]
Also called "1".
(1) A woolen cloth.
(2) Through "he". See "Luoji".
[②]［dā］
[The "Words" is well cut]
See "氀2毼".
[③] [kě]
["Jiyun" Qiu Ge cuts, enters, and brooks. ]
Same as "楬2".
No decorations.
Luo
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Mao Character Department] 　毼; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 595 04
[Guang Yun] Hu Cuaqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zheng Yun] He Geqie,? Yinhao. [Bo Ya]? Luo, Feng Ye. [Later Han·Wuhuan Biography] A woman can stab Wei, compose embroidery and weave. [Note] Guangya said: Zhuo Luo, Feng Ye, Zhuo, the power is overwhelming. Luo, Hu Ge countered. 【Chen Lin·Shenwu Fu】Golden-Jinxuan group, 罽毼leather suit.　Mascot also. Or make brown from clothing.　Same as He again. Chicken name. [Later Han·Southwestern Yi Biography] Ran Zhan Yi has five-horned sheep, musk, light-haired turkey, and animals. [Note] Guo Pu's note: "Shan Hai Jing" said: The rooster is as big as a pheasant, with a dazzling color and hairy horns. Today pass as he.　[Jiyun] Qiu Ge cut, sound thirsty. With the same. The bean is not decorated and said. Or from Mao Zuoluo. [Rituals and Funerals] Shuodou two. [Note] Luo, Bai Ye.　[Vocabulary] It’s close, and the answer is sound. 【Li Yi·Su Hu Xiao Lu】Today the vulgar vulgar calls people with inferior sex as 氀毼. Shunyin pocket, Shunyinda.
